trans-unit.source: Provides a set of static methods and properties that provide support for compilers.
trans-unit.target: 提供支援編譯器的一組靜態方法和屬性。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to reliably set handles by using the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareConstrainedRegions%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何可靠地使用設定控制代碼<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareConstrainedRegions%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To reliably set a handle to a specified pre-existing handle, you must ensure that the allocation of the native handle and the subsequent recording of that handle within a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle> object is atomic.
trans-unit.target: 若要可靠地設為指定的既有控制代碼的控制代碼，您必須確保原生控制代碼的配置和後續記錄內的控制代碼的<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle>物件是不可部分完成。

trans-unit.source: Any failure between these operations (such as a thread abort or out-of-memory exception) will result in the native handle being leaked.
trans-unit.target: 這些作業 （例如，執行緒中止或記憶體不足例外狀況） 之間的任何失敗會導致外洩的原生控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareConstrainedRegions%2A> method to make sure that the handle is not leaked.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareConstrainedRegions%2A>方法來確保控制代碼不會外洩。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the remaining stack space is large enough to execute the average .NET Framework function.
trans-unit.target: 確保其餘的堆疊空間夠大，足以執行一般的 .NET Framework 功能。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.EnsureSufficientExecutionStack%2A> provides information about an artificially limited stack that preserves enough space for an exception to be raised and recovery action to be taken.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.EnsureSufficientExecutionStack%2A> 提供相關資訊會保留足夠的空間會引發例外狀況以人為方式限制堆疊與所要採取的修復動作。

trans-unit.source: The artificial stack limit is chosen by the common language runtime to ensure that enough space remains to throw an exception safely.
trans-unit.target: 通用語言執行平台選擇的人為的堆疊限制確保足夠的空間保持安全地擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful in situations where stack overflow might occur as a result of unbounded recursion.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是在位置堆疊溢位可能會造成無限遞迴的情況下很有用。

trans-unit.source: It is intended for use in compiler services scenarios, although it can also be used safely in other development scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 它適用於在編譯器服務案例中，雖然它也可安全地在其他開發案例。

trans-unit.source: If the stack space is sufficient, the exception is not thrown, and most .NET Framework types and members can still be called.
trans-unit.target: 如果堆疊空間不足，才會擲回例外狀況，和大部分的.NET Framework 類型和成員仍然可以呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This method is not part of the constrained execution region (CER) support, and should not be confused with the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.ProbeForSufficientStack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不是限制的執行區域 (CER) 支援的一部分，且不能與混淆<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.ProbeForSufficientStack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The available stack space is insufficient to execute the average .NET Framework function.
trans-unit.target: 可用的堆疊空間不足，無法執行平均 .NET Framework 函式。

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個物件。

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> instances are considered equal.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 執行個體是否視為相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="o1" /> parameter is the same instance as the <paramref name="o2" /> parameter, or if both are <see langword="null" />, or if <c>o1.Equals(o2)</c> returns <see langword="true" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="o1" /> 參數是與 <paramref name="o2" /> 參數相同的執行個體，或兩者都是 <see langword="null" />，或 <c>o1.Equals(o2)</c> 傳回 <see langword="true" /> 的話，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by compilers.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器會使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to compare two objects by using the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何藉由比較兩個物件<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.Equals%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A delegate to the code to try.
trans-unit.target: 要嘗試之程式碼的委派。

trans-unit.source: A delegate to the code to run if an exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在發生例外狀況時執行的程式碼委派。

trans-unit.source: The data to pass to <c>code</c> and <c>backoutCode</c>.
trans-unit.target: 資料要傳遞至 <c>code</c> 和 <c>backoutCode</c>。

trans-unit.source: Executes code using a <see cref="T:System.Delegate" /> while using another <see cref="T:System.Delegate" /> to execute additional code in case of an exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Delegate" /> 執行程式碼，如果發生例外狀況，則使用另一個 <see cref="T:System.Delegate" /> 執行其他程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by compilers.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器會使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: An object to retrieve the hash code for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其擷取雜湊程式碼的物件。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for a particular object, and is suitable for use in algorithms and data structures that use hash codes, such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 做為特定物件的雜湊函式，適合在使用雜湊碼之雜湊演算法及資料結構中使用。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the object identified by the <paramref name="o" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 由 <paramref name="o" /> 參數所識別之物件的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method always calls the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method non-virtually, even if the object's type has overridden the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法一律會呼叫<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法非為虛擬，否則，即使物件的型別已覆寫<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> might differ from calling `GetHashCode` directly on the object with the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 因此，使用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>呼叫可能會與不同`GetHashCode`物件上直接<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns identical hash codes for identical object references, you should not use this method to test for object identity, because this hash code does not uniquely identify an object reference.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會傳回相同的物件參考相同的雜湊程式碼，您不應該使用這個方法來測試物件識別，因為此雜湊程式碼並未唯一識別的物件參考。

trans-unit.source: To test for object identify (that is, to test that two objects reference the same object in memory), call the <xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要測試的物件識別 （也就是要測試有兩個物件參考相同的物件，在記憶體中），呼叫<xref:System.Object.ReferenceEquals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Nor should you use <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A> to test whether two strings represent equal object references, because the string is interned.
trans-unit.target: 也不應該使用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A>來測試是否兩個字串代表相等的物件參考，因為實習的字串。

trans-unit.source: To test for string interning, call the <xref:System.String.IsInterned%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要測試的字串拘留，呼叫<xref:System.String.IsInterned%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods differ as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法不同，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> returns a hash code that is based on the object's definition of equality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 傳回的物件定義的等號比較為基礎的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: For example, two strings with identical contents will return the same value for <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，兩個字串完全相同的內容將會傳回相同的值<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> returns a hash code that indicates object identity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 傳回表示物件身分識別的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: That is, two string variables whose contents are identical and that represent a string that is interned (see the [String Interning](#interning) section) or that represent a single string in memory return identical hash codes.
trans-unit.target: 也就兩個字串的變數的內容完全相同，且代表實習的字串 (請參閱[字串拘留](#interning)> 一節) 或的代表記憶體中的單一字串傳回完全相同的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A> always returns identical hash codes for equal object references.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A>一律會傳回相同的物件參考相同的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: However, the reverse is not true: equal hash codes do not indicate equal object references.
trans-unit.target: 不過，反向並不成立： 等於雜湊程式碼並不指示進行相等的物件參考。

trans-unit.source: A particular hash code value is not unique to a particular object reference; different object references can generate identical hash codes.
trans-unit.target: 特定的雜湊碼值不是唯一一個特定的物件參考。不同的物件參考可以產生相同雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by compilers.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器會使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: String Interning
trans-unit.target: 字串拘留

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime (CLR) maintains an internal pool of strings and stores literals in the pool.
trans-unit.target: Common language runtime (CLR) 會維護字串內部集區和儲存集區中的常值。

trans-unit.source: If two strings (for example, `str1` and `str2`) are formed from an identical string literal, the CLR will set `str1` and `str2` to point to the same location on the managed heap to conserve memory.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個字串 (例如，`str1`和`str2`) 會組成相同的字串常值中，CLR 會設定`str1`和`str2`指向相同的位置，以節省記憶體 managed 堆積上。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> on these two string objects will produce the same hash code, contrary to the second bulleted item in the previous section.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>這些兩個字串物件將會產生相同雜湊程式碼，fci 上一節中的第二個項目符號項目。

trans-unit.source: The CLR adds only literals to the pool.
trans-unit.target: CLR 會將只有常值加入至集區。

trans-unit.source: Results of string operations such as concatenation are not added to the pool, unless the compiler resolves the string concatenation as a single string literal.
trans-unit.target: 例如串連的字串作業的結果不會加入至集區，除非編譯器會解析成單一字串常值的字串串連。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if `str2` was created as the result of a concatenation operation, and `str2` is identical to `str1`, using <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> on these two string objects will not produce the same hash code.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果`str2`串連作業的結果建立了和`str2`等同於`str1`，並使用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>這些兩個字串物件將不會產生相同雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: If you want to add a concatenated string to the pool explicitly, use the <xref:System.String.Intern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要明確地新增到集區的串連的字串，使用<xref:System.String.Intern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.String.IsInterned%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to check whether a string has an interned reference.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.String.IsInterned%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法檢查字串是否具有實習的參考。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the difference between the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範之間的差異<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The output from the example illustrates the following:
trans-unit.target: 範例輸出說明下列各項：

trans-unit.source: Both sets of hash codes for the first set of strings passed to the `ShowHashCodes` method are different, because the strings are completely different.
trans-unit.target: 這兩組的雜湊碼的第一個集合的字串傳遞至`ShowHashCodes`方法都不同，因為是完全不同的字串。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> generates the same hash code for the second set of strings passed to the `ShowHashCodes` method, because the strings are equal.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 會產生相同雜湊程式碼的第二組的字串傳遞至`ShowHashCodes`方法，因為字串相等。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method does not.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法則否。

trans-unit.source: The first string is defined by using a string literal and so is interned.
trans-unit.target: 第一個字串是由定義使用字串常值和實習因此。

trans-unit.source: Although the value of the second string is the same, it is not interned, because it is returned by a call to the <xref:System.String.Format%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 第二個字串的值都相同，雖然它不實習，因為它由呼叫<xref:System.String.Format%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: In the case of the third string, the hash codes produced by <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> for both strings are identical, as are the hash codes produced by <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 在第三個字串，雜湊程式碼所產生的<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的這兩個字串完全相同，所產生之雜湊碼的<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This is because the compiler has treated the value assigned to both strings as a single string literal, and so the string variables refer to the same interned string.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為編譯器已被視為單一的字串常值，以指派至這兩個字串的值，使其參考相同的實習字串的字串變數。

trans-unit.source: The value type to be boxed.
trans-unit.target: 要進行 Box 的實值類型。

trans-unit.source: Boxes a value type.
trans-unit.target: 對實值類型進行 Box 動作。

trans-unit.source: A boxed copy of <paramref name="obj" /> if it is a value class; otherwise, <paramref name="obj" /> itself.
trans-unit.target: 如果是值類別，則為 <paramref name="obj" /> Boxed 複本，否則為 <paramref name="obj" /> 本身。

trans-unit.source: Boxing a value type creates an object and performs a shallow copy of the fields of the specified value type into the new object.
trans-unit.target: Box 處理實值類型建立的物件，並執行新的物件將指定的值類型欄位的淺層複本。

trans-unit.source: This method allows a value class to be manipulated as an object while it retains the aliasing behavior of a value class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓實值類別，它會保留的實值類別別名行為時，做為物件可操作。

trans-unit.source: The return value depends on whether the value class is mutable or immutable:
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值取決於實值類別是否處於可變動或不變：

trans-unit.source: If the value being assigned is a mutable value class, the method returns a shallow copy of the class, because value classes have copy semantics.
trans-unit.target: 如果指派的值是可變動值類別，方法會傳回類別的淺層複本，因為實值類別具有複製語意。

trans-unit.source: If the value being assigned is an immutable value class, the method returns the object itself, instead of a copy of the class.
trans-unit.target: 如果不可變的實值類別指派的值，則方法會傳回物件本身，而不是類別的複本。

trans-unit.source: Compilers of dynamically typed languages can use this method to make sure that boxed value types work identically to unboxed value types.
trans-unit.target: 動態具類型的語言編譯器可以使用這個方法，以確定 boxed 實的值類型相同用於 unboxed 實的值類型。

trans-unit.source: That is, boxed value types get cloned when you pass them around, and they are always passed by value.
trans-unit.target: 也就是當您傳遞，而且永遠依值傳遞時，取得複製 boxed 實的值類型。

trans-unit.source: The compiler can call <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetObjectValue%2A> to assign a value type to an object or to pass a value type as a parameter of a type object.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器可以呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetObjectValue%2A>指派實值類型的物件，或傳遞實值類型做為參數的型別物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by compilers.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器會使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to box a value class by using the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetObjectValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用方塊實值類別<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetObjectValue%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The array to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: 要初始化的陣列。

trans-unit.source: A field handle that specifies the location of the data used to initialize the array.
trans-unit.target: 一種欄位控制代碼，可指定用來初始化陣列的資料位置。

trans-unit.source: Provides a fast way to initialize an array from data that is stored in a module.
trans-unit.target: 提供從儲存在模組中的資料初始化陣列的快速方式。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by compilers.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器會使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the offset, in bytes, to the data in the given string.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定字串中資料的位移 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset, from the start of the <see cref="T:System.String" /> object to the first character in the string.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 物件開始到字串中之第一個字元的位元組位移。

trans-unit.source: Compilers use this property for unsafe, but efficient, pointer operations on the characters in a managed string.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器會使用這個屬性不安全，但有效率的指標上的作業中的 managed 字串的字元。

trans-unit.source: Compilers should pin the string against movement by the garbage collector before use.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器應該固定使用之前在記憶體回收行程移動對字串。

trans-unit.source: Note that common language runtime strings are immutable; that is, their contents can be read but not changed.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，通用語言執行階段字串是不可變的;也就是說，可以讀取但不是會變更其內容。

trans-unit.source: Designates a body of code as a constrained execution region (CER).
trans-unit.target: 指定一段程式碼主體做為限制的執行區域 (CER)。

trans-unit.source: Compilers use this method to mark `catch`, `finally`, and `fault` blocks as constrained execution regions (CERs).
trans-unit.target: 編譯器會使用這個方法來標示`catch`， `finally`，和`fault`為限制的執行區域 (Cer) 的區塊。

trans-unit.source: Code that is marked as a constrained region must only call other code with strong reliability contracts.
trans-unit.target: 已標示為限制的區域必須只呼叫有充分的可靠性合約的其他程式碼的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: It should not allocate or make virtual calls to unprepared or unreliable methods unless it is prepared to handle failures.
trans-unit.target: 它不應該配置或進行虛擬呼叫或不可靠的方法，除非它已準備好要處理失敗。

trans-unit.source: Note that no intermediate language opcodes, except `NOP`, are allowed between a call to the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareConstrainedRegions%2A> method and the `try` block.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，不對中繼語言 opcode，除了`NOP`，允許呼叫間<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareConstrainedRegions%2A>方法和`try`區塊。

trans-unit.source: For more information about CERs, see the classes in the <xref:System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如需 Cer 的詳細資訊，請參閱中的類別<xref:System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution>命名空間。

trans-unit.source: CERs that are marked using the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareConstrainedRegions%2A> method do not work perfectly when a <xref:System.StackOverflowException> is generated from the `try` block.
trans-unit.target: 使用標示的 Cer<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareConstrainedRegions%2A>方法無法完全運作時<xref:System.StackOverflowException>產生從`try`區塊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.ExecuteCodeWithGuaranteedCleanup%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.ExecuteCodeWithGuaranteedCleanup%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareConstrainedRegions%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.ProbeForSufficientStack%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareConstrainedRegions%2A> 方法會呼叫 <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.ProbeForSufficientStack%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to reliably set handles by using the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareConstrainedRegions%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何可靠地使用設定控制代碼<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareConstrainedRegions%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To reliably set a handle to a specified pre-existing handle, you must ensure that the allocation of the native handle and the subsequent recording of that handle within a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle> object is atomic.
trans-unit.target: 若要可靠地設為指定的既有控制代碼的控制代碼，您必須確保原生控制代碼的配置和後續記錄內的控制代碼的<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle>物件是不可部分完成。

trans-unit.source: Any failure between these operations (such as a thread abort or out-of-memory exception) will result in the native handle being leaked.
trans-unit.target: 這些作業 （例如，執行緒中止或記憶體不足例外狀況） 之間的任何失敗會導致外洩的原生控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareConstrainedRegions%2A> method to make sure that the handle is not leaked.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareConstrainedRegions%2A>方法來確保控制代碼不會外洩。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Designates a body of code as a constrained execution region (CER) without performing any probing.
trans-unit.target: 指定程式碼主體做為限制的執行區域 (CER)，但不執行任何探查。

trans-unit.source: Compilers should not call this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器不應該直接呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Instead, define a CER by calling the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareConstrainedRegions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，藉由呼叫定義 CER<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareConstrainedRegions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The event delegate to prepare.
trans-unit.target: 要準備的事件委派。

trans-unit.source: Provides a way for applications to dynamically prepare <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> event delegates.
trans-unit.target: 提供讓應用程式動態準備 <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> 事件委派的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.AppDomain> event delegates such as <xref:System.AppDomain.DomainUnload>, <xref:System.AppDomain.ProcessExit>, and <xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException> are not automatically prepared at startup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain> 事件的委派例如<xref:System.AppDomain.DomainUnload>， <xref:System.AppDomain.ProcessExit>，和<xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException>在啟動時不會自動準備。

trans-unit.source: You can use the following methods to prepare them:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用下列方法，以準備：

trans-unit.source: Attribute the method by using the <xref:System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.PrePrepareMethodAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 使用屬性方法<xref:System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.PrePrepareMethodAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Attribute the method by using the <xref:System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.ReliabilityContractAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 使用屬性方法<xref:System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.ReliabilityContractAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareContractedDelegate%2A> method to dynamically prepare the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareContractedDelegate%2A>動態準備委派的方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the article [Keep Your Code Running with the Reliability Features of the .NET Framework](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=145491) in the MSDN Magazine.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文章[保持您程式碼執行與.NET Framework 的可靠性功能](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=145491)MSDN Magazine 中。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The delegate type to prepare.
trans-unit.target: 要準備的委派類型。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the specified delegate should be prepared for inclusion in a constrained execution region (CER).
trans-unit.target: 表示應該準備指定的委派，以便將該委派加入限制的執行區域 (CER)。

trans-unit.source: Compilers use this method to prepare a delegate's invocation method and to prepare the target of that invocation (and the delegate's statically determinable call graph) as a constrained execution region (CER).
trans-unit.target: 編譯器會使用此方法準備委派的引動過程的方法，並準備目標的這個引動過程 （和委派以靜態方式判斷呼叫歷程圖） 做為限制的執行區域 (CER)。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Prepares a method for inclusion in a constrained execution region (CER).
trans-unit.target: 準備要加入至限制的執行區域 (CER) 的方法。

trans-unit.source: A handle to the method to prepare.
trans-unit.target: 要準備的方法控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Prepares a method for inclusion in a constrained execution region (CER).
trans-unit.target: 準備要加入至限制的執行區域 (CER) 的方法。

trans-unit.source: Compilers use the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareMethod%28System.RuntimeMethodHandle%29> method to handle virtual calls that are made inside a constrained execution region (CER).
trans-unit.target: 編譯器會使用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareMethod%28System.RuntimeMethodHandle%29>方法以處理限制的執行區域 (CER) 內進行虛擬呼叫。

trans-unit.source: At JIT compilation time, the common language runtime does not usually have enough information about the target of a virtual call.
trans-unit.target: 在 JIT 編譯時期，通用語言執行平台通常沒有足夠資訊虛擬呼叫的目標。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the runtime does not initially prepare that segment of the call graph.
trans-unit.target: 因此，執行階段不一開始會準備該區段的呼叫歷程圖。

trans-unit.source: If the code that is using the CER has enough knowledge to determine the target at any point in time before the CER is actually entered, it can call <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareMethod%28System.RuntimeMethodHandle%29> to perform the same runtime preparation normally done for a CER rooted at the method specified as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 CER 程式碼有足夠的資訊來判斷在任何時間點目標的 CER 之前的時間實際上在輸入，它可以呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareMethod%28System.RuntimeMethodHandle%29>執行相同的執行階段準備通常針對完成 CER 根目錄指定做為引數的方法。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A handle to the method to prepare.
trans-unit.target: 要準備的方法控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The instantiation to pass to the method.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至方法的執行個體化。

trans-unit.source: Prepares a method for inclusion in a constrained execution region (CER) with the specified instantiation.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的執行個體化 (Instantiation) 準備要加入至限制的執行區域 (CER) 的方法。

trans-unit.source: You can provide generics support for compilers by using the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareMethod%28System.RuntimeMethodHandle%2CSystem.RuntimeTypeHandle%5B%5D%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用泛型都支援適用於編譯器<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareMethod%28System.RuntimeMethodHandle%2CSystem.RuntimeTypeHandle%5B%5D%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime cannot prepare constrained execution regions (CERs) rooted in a method that has generic type parameters (either a type parameter on the class containing the method or one on the method itself) when those type parameters are instantiated as reference types.
trans-unit.target: Common language runtime 無法準備限制的執行區域 (Cer) 的方法具有泛型型別參數 （可能是型別參數上的方法或另一個在方法本身包含的類別），在根項目時具現化這些型別參數做為參考型別。

trans-unit.source: You can use this overload to pass a specific instantiation (such as an array of types), specifying class type parameters first (if any), followed by method type parameters (if any).
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個多載，將特定的具現化，（例如陣列的型別），第一次指定類別型別參數 （如果有的話），後面接著方法型別參數 （如果有的話）。

trans-unit.source: The runtime prepares that instantiation of the method.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段準備的具現化的方法。

trans-unit.source: (This is necessary only if the instantiations you use contain at least one reference type parameter.) Thus, you can use a CER-style `try` clause in a generic method (or a nongeneric method on a generic class) and it will work reliably with instantiations of <xref:System.Int32> or other value types.
trans-unit.target: （這是您使用具現化包含至少一個參考型別參數時，才需要。）因此，您可以使用 CER 樣式`try`泛型方法 （或在泛型類別上的非泛型方法） 中的子句和可靠地運作的具現化與<xref:System.Int32>或其他實值類型。

trans-unit.source: To instantiate reference types such as <xref:System.String>, you must use an explicit <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareMethod%28System.RuntimeMethodHandle%2CSystem.RuntimeTypeHandle%5B%5D%29> method on the CER root method first.
trans-unit.target: 具現化參考類型例如<xref:System.String>，您必須使用明確<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareMethod%28System.RuntimeMethodHandle%2CSystem.RuntimeTypeHandle%5B%5D%29>CER 方法根方法的第一次。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Probes for a certain amount of stack space to ensure that a stack overflow cannot happen within a subsequent block of code (assuming that your code uses only a finite and moderate amount of stack space).
trans-unit.target: 探查特定的堆疊空間量，以確保後續的程式碼區塊中不會發生堆疊溢位 (假設您的程式碼只使用有限且適量的堆疊空間)。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you use a constrained execution region (CER) instead of this method.
trans-unit.target: 建議您使用限制的執行區域 (CER) 來取代這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by the constrained execution region (CER) infrastructure when running in hosts that are resilient to stack overflow such as Microsoft SQL Server and Microsoft Exchange Server.
trans-unit.target: 限制的執行區域 (CER) 基礎結構有彈性地堆疊溢位，例如 Microsoft SQL Server 和 Microsoft Exchange Server 的主機中執行時，會使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This method currently probes for 48 KB of stack space on the x86 platform, but the exact amount may change over time and may vary on other platforms.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法目前探查 48 KB 的堆疊空間 x86 平台，但確切的容量可能會隨著時間改變，而在其他平台上可能有所不同。

trans-unit.source: This method is also used by compilers.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器也會使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.ProbeForSufficientStack%2A> method, you should use a standard CER.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.ProbeForSufficientStack%2A>方法，您應該使用標準的 CER。

trans-unit.source: That is, if you are planning to use a moderate amount of stack space, call the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareConstrainedRegions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method immediately before your `try`/`finally` or `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 如果您打算使用適量的堆疊空間，也就是呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.PrepareConstrainedRegions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法之前，立即您`try` / `finally`或`try` / `catch`區塊。

trans-unit.source: If you are calling a recursive method or plan to use a lot of stack space, you must use the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.ExecuteCodeWithGuaranteedCleanup%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將會呼叫遞迴方法或計劃以使用大量的堆疊空間，您必須使用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.ExecuteCodeWithGuaranteedCleanup%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A type handle that specifies the class constructor method to run.
trans-unit.target: 一種類型控制代碼，可指定要執行的類別建構函式方法。

trans-unit.source: Runs a specified class constructor method.
trans-unit.target: 執行指定類別建構函式 (Constructor) 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by compilers.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器會使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The class initializer throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 類別初始設定式擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A handle that specifies the module constructor method to run.
trans-unit.target: 一種控制代碼，可指定要執行的模組建構函式方法。

trans-unit.source: Runs a specified module constructor method.
trans-unit.target: 執行指定的模組建構函式方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by compilers.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器會使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The module constructor throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 模組建構函式擲回例外狀況。
